headline: Democrats Look to Redefine Trump
description: Democrats are trying to paint Trump as a self-interested fraud in an effort to erode his support among middle-class voters, as Kamala Harris leads the ticket with Tim Walz as her running mate.

headline: The U.S. added far fewer jobs than previously reported
description: The Labor Department's revision indicates that monthly payroll figures overstated U.S. job growth by about 818,000, revealing more severe issues in the labor market.

headline: Israel and Hezbollah exchanged strikes
description: The Israeli military launched airstrikes in Lebanon targeting Hezbollah's weapon-storage facilities, prompting Hezbollah to retaliate by targeting an Israeli military base in the Golan Heights.
